data.fullContent: Dorothy Naum was a pioneer in women's baseball. She played in an era when women athletes did not get as much respect or attention as modern players. She played just six of a decade, and was both a pitcher and a catcher. Her promising career was ultimately interrupted in 1953 when she became pregnant with her first child.
data.answer: 多萝西·诺姆是女子棒球的先驱。她所处的时代，女性运动员不像现代运动员那样得到那么多的尊重和关注。十年来，她只打了六场，既是投手又是接球手。她前途无量的职业生涯最终在1953年被中断，当时她怀上了第一个孩子。
